author: wtopstaff
title: Bruins-Islanders Sum
text:
0 1—3 
First Period_1, Boston, Connolly 2 (Marchand, Bergeron), 9:51. 2, N.Y. Islanders, Bailey 3 (Tavares, Strome), 14:08 (pp). 3, N.Y. Islanders, Cizikas 1 (Boychuk, Martin), 15:27. 
Second Period_4, Boston, Kemppainen 1 (Spooner), 16:13. 5, Boston, Pastrnak 2 (Eriksson), 18:16.

Shots on Goal_Boston 8-11-7_26. N.Y. Islanders 18-5-3_26.
